answers.answer: Yes, I'm getting check every two weeks for preeclampsia. there is no real signs of it, high blood pressure is a very first sign but as well as swelling. Go to your Dr or Mid wife Hun and get a full check up! It's very important because there is many risk to you and your baby. Good luck x

I was just wondering. .. what will they do at the full check up I've only noticed my hands and feet.. not face not blurred vision I have normal perfect blood pressure.. I will ask at my next apt. But what other symptoms shoukd I Be concerned of

They take a blood test, another blood pressure test and urine test. I have had no blurred vision though, you should be fine if your blood pressure is good but just talk to them about it, can't hurt just asking and checking up :)
This is my second time with it. You need swelling and protein to be diagnosed but swelling that wont go away is a symptom of the increased blood pressure so you should ger checked out.

question: Can you have preclamsia and have normal blood pressure but excessive swelling.
title: HELP
